name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Peter Floyd ANDERSON, Jr.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Peter Floyd ANDERSON, Jr.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Peter Floyd ANDERSON, Jr.
No. D-2850.
Supreme Court of the United States
Nov. 2, 2015.
Peter Floyd Anderson, Jr., of Garnerville, New York, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
